spotimoo package

spotimoo.exceptions module

exception spotimoo.exceptions.IncorrectRequest(status_code: int)

Bases: Exception

Raises when we got request error.

spotimoo.spotimoo module

class spotimoo.spotimoo.Spotimoo(client_id: str, client_secret: str, *, timeout: int = 10)

Bases: object

Spotimoo is a base class that provides an interface to the Spotify API.

Parameters:

  • client_id (str) – Client ID field from Spotify API that must be supplied or set as enviroment variable

  • client_secret (str) – Client Secret field from Spotify API that must be supplied or set as enviroment variable

  • timeout (int, optional) – How long will you have to wait to get a message about a failed request

track(track_id: str) → Response

Request that return response with track information.

Parameters:

track_id (str) –

Track identifier in Spotify. For example:

Link: https://open.spotify.com/track/4cOdK2wGLETKBW3PvgPWqT?si=5e9a14dc868948da

Track ID: 4cOdK2wGLETKBW3PvgPWqT

Returns:

Response to this request

Return type:

requests.model.Response
